name: Experion Technologies
overview:
Experion is a 5+ year old company which develops mobile and web applications, frameworks and solutions for its customers worldwide.

Experion has presence in Australia, India, US, Denmark, Netherlands, Germany and Switzerland.

Experion leverages mobile technologies and the power of analytics to deliver powerful applications and solutions to support field (sales, distribution, service) operations of enterprises worldwide.

Experion’s flagship product FieldMax is among the world’s first Java and Android based sales order and distribution management solution built for Consumer Products/ FMCG Industries. (www.fieldmax.in)

Experion has developed over 100 Enterprise Mobility Applications across iOS, Android, Blackberry, Java, Windows, Symbian and Meego.

Customers include: Bacardi,Merck Group, Mars, J&J, Alexion, Aegon, Aditya Birla Group, Supreme Group, Hindustan LifeCare, Dr.Oetker, Astra Zeneca, Regus, Sephora,NCI, Danish Army, Netherlands Police apart from several small and medium sized customers worldwide.
